short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 在豆瓣读书页面显示湾区哪些图书馆有此藏书 - Show the list of libraries in Bayarea having the book on Douban Book page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
